quote: It's never too late to be what you might have been
author: George Eliot

quote: People will forget what you said,people will forget what you did, But people will never forget how you made them feel
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The meaning of life is to find your gift, the purpose of life is to gift it away.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If light is in your heart, you will find your way home.
author: Runi Jaffrey

quote: Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the ones we miss.
author: F Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Don't surrender all your joys for an idea you used to have about yourself that isn't true anymore.
author: Cheryl Strayed

quote: It takes a great deal of courage to see the world in all its tainted glory and still love it.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A single dream is more powerful than a thousand realities
author: J R R Tolkein

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people to have an extraordinary destiny.
author: C S Lewis

quote: You can't wait for inspiration,you have to go after it with a club
author: Jack London
